class PCTHierarchy[source]

PCTHierarchy(rows=1, cols=1, name='pcthierarchy', links='single', history=False, **pargs)

A hierarchical perceptual control system, of PCTNodes.

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
hpct = PCTHierarchy(3,3, links="dense")
hpct.hierarchy

[]

[[<pct.nodes.PCTNode at 0x215f106aa08>,
